article_title: EWTN still has hope despite losing federal appeal
article_text:
Video Transcript

EWTN RESPONDING? SARAH. WELL, BROOKE, THEY ARE OBVIOUSLY DISAPPOINTED IN THE RULING, BUT THEY SAY THE FIGHT IS NOT OVER. FEDERAL APPEALS COURT BASED IN ATLANTA RULED IN A 2-1. A 2-1 RULING AGAINST EWTN. THE RULING COMES MORE THAN A A

article_metadata.description: 11th Circuit Court of Appeals ruled against EWTN's lawsuit over the contraceptive mandate in the Affordable Care Act.
